dynamic_line.yes: Hello, Miss, What do you want from me?
dynamic_line.no: Hello, what do you want from me?

responses.text: How do you serve as a soldier of the Red line?

dynamic_line: It's a duty I take with the utmost importance, there is no duty as solemn or as important as being a standard bearer of the proletarian revolution. Those Reich fascists and South Gate dogs will soon be welcomed into our fold, with blood if need be!
